data.title: Petroglyph
data.meta_description:
Petroglyph is a video game developer. The company was formed by a group of former Westwood Studios employees. Petroglyph is primarily known for their strong experience in RTS game development. The company's founding members have worked on seminal and influential games in the genre, most notably Command & Conquer and Dune II, which established the template for modern RTS games.

Petroglyph's employees average more than 12 years of industry experience.

Based in Las Vegas, Nevada.



Microbadge: - Petroglyph fan
